MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2.30PM to safely replace electrical equipment near to Bourhouse and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:26 PM on Wednesday, 10 February 2021.
